channel.title: Forum glitch?
channel.description:
Just thought I'd post this as others have been having this problem as well.
Basically my minecraft character's face on the forums where it says our minecraft character's name below our Mopar name doesn't show the right skin, it shows steve while my actual skin is a sheep. I have definitely purchased minecraft and skinned my character correctly as well.
-note that it's not actually a serious problem it's just an extremely minor glitch.

item.title: Forum glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:8, topic:435377”][quote author=triston001 link=topic=538096.msg3937422#msg3937422 date=1331155144]
you have to go into profile>modify profile>forum profile. there u should see “Minecraft name”, now write the complete name that u use on the official minecraft page (minecraft.net) and that will place your skin :3
you are welcome
[/quote]
Thanks for the useless tad bit of information I already stated I knew.[/quote]
The “you’re welcome” at the end really seals it.

Read full topic

you are welcome[/quote]

item.title: Forum glitch?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

as hat trix said, you have to match the capitals, your name should be Ignorant_Sheep else it didn’t show the skin.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

I’ve played on the server however my account has a _ in it and I can’t log in without it so I’ll have to painfully be steve I guess

Read full topic

item.title: Forum glitch?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

And I believe you have to play on the server at least once for the image to appear.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum glitch?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

Do you have capital letters matching correctly with the account you bought? It does make a difference. when Dreagon wasn’t capitalizing his name on my server, he had steve’s skin. When he did capitalize his name on this server, he has a completely different skin.

zuppers beat me to it by like a second

Read full topic
